price: 24. al Faraón, a (su ministro) Haman y a Qarun[883]; pero (estos) dijeron: “(Moisés) no es sino un brujo embustero”.
arabic: إِلَىٰ فِرۡعَوۡنَ وَهَٰمَٰنَ وَقَٰرُونَ فَقَالُواْ سَٰحِرٞ كَذَّابٞ
footnotes: [883]  Ver la nota de la aleya 76 de la sura 28.

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: ilā fir'ʿawna wahāmāna waqārūna faqālū sāḥirun kadhābun
